Relax and Treat Yourself

Your spa experience awaits at Serenity Relax&Spa!

Ready to escape the daily grind? At Serenity Relax&Spa, we have got just what you need to unwind and recharge. Whether you are craving a relaxing massage to shake off the stress or a refreshing spa treatment to lift your spirits, our professional team is here to help you feel your best. Discover a journey of self-care with us—because you deserve it.

Our Programs

Thai massage

Thai massage is a unique therapeutic practice that combines acupressure, gentle stretching, and rhythmic movement. Performed on a mat while fully clothed, it promotes relaxation, improves flexibility, and stimulates energy flow. This ancient art aims to balance body and mind, leaving individuals rejuvenated and centred after each session.

Duration: 60min

Price: 600kr

Book now
Facial treatment

Experience rejuvenation with our facial treatment, designed to cleanse, exfoliate, and hydrate your skin. Enjoy a relaxing massage and nourishing products for a radiant, youthful glow that lasts.

Duration: 40min

Price: 500kr

Book now
Couple massage

Couple massage is a shared therapeutic experience where partners receive simultaneous massages in the same room. This intimate setting fosters relaxation and connection, allowing couples to unwind together. Skilled therapists tailor techniques to each individual’s needs, promoting stress relief, improved intimacy, and a deeper bond between partners.

Duration: 80min

Price: 1680kr

Book now
